physical_appearance: "The book is hardcover and its front cover and spine are black in colour. The book is open and the contents of two pages are displayed. The title, contributor, author, illustrator, and publisher are displayed on the page on the right hand side of the book. There is an image of a mountain with a body of water and some small boats on the left page. ""Santabong Entrance"" is stated at the bottom of the image. ""O.W. Brierly""
